As we have reviewed the work of your Association we have been encouraged

We are glad to be associated with you for another three-year period with
the hope that during this time your organization will not only render
a very valuable service to American education, but will also secure
greater stability with respect to ways and means for permanent support
of its operational program.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
